replies.body: So Kayn didn’t get to have a set of chromas and an icon huh? -.-

kayn has 3 icons and its a legendary tier skin
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Do you know how much work that would take to create 5-8 chromas for his skin. Which is basically 3-in-1. Chromas for Rhaast and Shadow Assassin + basic Kayn. Be happy he finally got something good. It's honestly better than a set of chromas, otherwise it would have been a 1350 skin + chromas.{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Has anyone gotten to play this mode on the pbe? How hard are the Captain and Onslaught difficulty levels? What I mean is, will they demoralize and crush anyone but the challenger level players, or are they (I hope) challenging without being unkind to casuals like me?
This mode skipped PBE, but my guess is Onslaught will be as challenging as Onlsaught(think it was called that) in the Star Guardian Game mode.

Thanks for the answer, though I hope you don't mind a followup question. I missed Star Guardian as I have been mainly playing Killing Floor 2 and only recently picked up LoL again around the time Versus came out. How does the difficulty compare to something like doom bots?

If you learned the correct strategy and build paths in the onslaught version of star guardian it made the mode alot less hard, I played onslaught for the missions the hardest mission was getting an S, nobody on your team could die more then 2 times, you had to get most of the bonus stuff and you had to kill the boss very fast(the mode itself was not that hard after 10-20 times playing it), in my opinion doom-bots lvl 100 was alot harder because most of it was based on luck and your team picks,
TLDR if you learn the correct way to optimize onslaught in the star guardian game was a lot easier, I am guessing its going to be around the same here as well.
love it. love it all
Some of those Odyssey missions look semi troll; I can't wait to see whenever someone is going for the BoRK, Rageblade Malphite mission. xD
i really want to do the 5 yasuos one
i've done it and honestly it was super fun lol. i was the one killing all the monsters XDXDXD{{champion:54}} {{item:3149}} {{item:3124}}

Will the Planetary Legends quest also provide a Ziggs champion if he's unowned?
It is a Shard, not a skin Permanent, so probably not.
So, can you craft the icon without the border? I kinda dislike borders.

You can't; they're a package deal.  If you craft the icon and don't want the border, you should contact support and they might be able to remove it for you!  You're still "paying" tokens for the birder though, which sucks.  Which one were you looking to craft?

I don't mind the price, I really just don't want the borders. I think they kinda mess up the card's art. I'm writting a support ticket right now to ask if they'll remove it if I get it. I really want the Jinx icon, but if support can't  remove the border I'll just have to skip it.
Why does the event start on Wendsday, a day later than other regions?
...you know that the earth spins right?
Because the patch always hits on Wednesday mornings after patch notes Tuesdays.

The way the missions and the game mode have been made, it really doesnt fit with how the lobby is made. If you want to do a certain mission and someone else doesn't you'r fucked and get the same penalty as other mode (dodging, same wait timer, reports, etc.) Riot should have thought about it, it's not like in rift's missions!!
can non lvl 30 players complete these quests cause I done it twice and still not completed first quests
I still did not understand how ro get ziggs border???

You cannot buy the Ziggs border; it's available through a mission.  The very same mission also gives a Skin shard for the skin, so if you want the border, I'd recommend saving your money since you can get the skin for free that way!
How am I going to get 4 people to agree to playing Ziggs/Sona?? I have like 2 friends :(

Well, look at it this way, everyone's going to have the same missions at some point, so you'll basically have to get lucky in matchmaking, but there's always a chance your teammates need the same mission you do

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Hopefully, but for the Star Guardian event you couldn't complete with Rando's and had to be in a 5 man for many of the specialty missions to get credit, which wound up killing it for me simply because my schedule doesn't let me grind with a bunch of other people very often. This looks to be about the same unfortunately, unless they're going to let us complete with rando's but they were opposed to it last time.
Am I able to get the border and icons for Odyssey Kayn without having to purchase the whole bundle? like will the border come with purchasing the skin on the event date and the icons sold seperate?

Are mission tokens ONLY available via missions this time? I don't see mention of store availability. If this is the case, I'm only counting 100 of them, and that doesn't give a lot of room for flexibility if you're buying the border/icon set.
Yeah, strangely they didn't mention the orb bundles or what is included in them or their prices,
I'm cool that we can get the Ziggs skin for effectively free if we clear the missions but can I ask why it's and the border are a mission reward and legacy?

Because it's an exclusive reward for playing the game mode. Legacy only means it's stuffed in the Vault. Unless this one breaks the mold, it'll still be obtainable, albeit rarely, from Hextech chests.

I'm sure people will like this because it's different than than the norm, but if it weren't for the missions with rewards I would never play this. This does not have an "I've accomplished something!" aspect. We play against real people everyday then you throw bots at us. I did not learn anything by playing these bots. I get augments and a different experience but it does not add to the normal game in anyway. Coincidentally, it was the same for the star guardian events too. This is just my opinion. 

p.s.

Bring Nexus Blitz back.......
So it seems you can't buy Kayn icons w/o a bundle…? That really sucks. I don't like playing Kayn or even own him, but some of my friends and I wanted the icons only :// smh
if I get in a group wanting to do no im the captain I refuse to do it and choose TEEMO if able
